attributes.action: Call for a vote of no confidence in his role and his party
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Who is being listened to in this democratic state?  1.5 million people have voted against the proposed road charging scheme.  Instead of listening us they are going to talk us around to a "different" idea but introduce what they originally planned.  This is not acceptable! Listen to the nation and what people want.  Stand down as Prime minister and discontinue making a mockery of our country!
